channel.title: Why not spec bar

item.title: Why not spec bar
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:4, topic:179458"]More then likely, you haven’t declared the SpecialHandler , or just aren’t even accessing it.[/quote]i do.

[quote=“Aurai, post:5, topic:179458”]Its probably because you haven’t instantiated the handler, or the frame isn’t even being shown.
Try adding this code in the initialize() method of client:

SpecialHandler SpecialHandler = new SpecialHandler();

Based on that handler, though, it looks like it will take more then that.
Did you follow the tutorial 100%?[/quote]yeah, i coded my friends server and it works on that. i’m using phonescape base

Read full topic

item.title: Why not spec bar
item.dc:creator: @Aurai Aurai
item.description:
@Aurai wrote:

Its probably because you haven’t instantiated the handler, or the frame isn’t even being shown.
Try adding this code in the initialize() method of client:

SpecialHandler SpecialHandler = new SpecialHandler();

Based on that handler, though, it looks like it will take more then that.
Did you follow the tutorial 100%?

Read full topic

item.title: Why not spec bar
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

More then likely, you haven’t declared the SpecialHandler , or just aren’t even accessing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Why not spec bar
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

They don’t like you.

That’s all I can think of.

Read full topic

item.title: Why not spec bar
item.dc:creator: @X_Da_Master_X X Da Master X
item.description:
@X_Da_Master_X wrote:

Sr i can’t help you my specials are looking different.
You have a special att handler and my special att code is in client.java
I downloaded a server With special att.

Are u sure that your client.java knows he must open ur special att handler?

Read full topic

item.title: Why not spec bar
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

ok, my friend told me to add this tut to my server so i did, got no errors but the spec bar wont show up. why?

spechandle:

[code]import java.io.*;
public class SpecialHandler {
public int specialAmount = 100;
public int specialDelay = 0;
public boolean usingSpecial = false;
public int specialDamage = 0;
public boolean returnWeapon(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return true;
}
else
return false;
}
public int returnWeaponEmote(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return 1068;
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return 1658;
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return 451;
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return 1060;
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return 451;
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return 426;
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return 440;
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return 2067;
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return 2075;
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return 2066;
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return 2080;
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return 2068;
}
else
return 0;
}
public int GetSpecDamage(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return 18 + misc.random(8);
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return 20 + misc.random(10);
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return 18 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return 20 + misc.random(10);
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return 30 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return 20 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return 22 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
else
return 0;
}
public int GetSpecCost(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return 25;
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return 50;
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return 50;
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return 40;
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return 75;
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return 50;
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return 100;
}
else
return 0;
}
public int GetSpecProjectile(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return 252;
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return 341;
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return 248;
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return 251;
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return 347;
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return 256;
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return 282;
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return 432;
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return 432;
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return 432;
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return 432;
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return 432;
}
else
return 0;
}
public void fsBar(int one, int two, int three) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
if (p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)) {
person.fsBar(one, two, three);
}
}
}
public void sendFrame126(String one, int two) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
if (p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)) {
person.sendFrame126(one, two);
}
}
}
public void l33thax(int id) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
if (p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)) {
person.l33thax(id);
}
}
}
public static void createSpec(int castId, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int startHeight, int endHeight, int enemyY, int enemyX, int MageAttackIndex) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if(person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)
person.specspell(castId, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, startHeight, endHeight, enemyY, enemyX, MageAttackIndex);}
}
}

public void process() {
if (specialDelay <= 0) {
specialDelay = 4;
}
specialDelay -= 1;
